definition: to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
to beat/to hit/variant of 考[kao3]/to inspect/to test/to take an exam
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father

sentences.english: Take an examination of legal couplet, to the personnel of legal major, better.
sentences.chinese: 考法律联考，对于法律专业的人员，比较好。

sentences.english: So you failed the college entrance exam. You've plenty of company.
sentences.chinese: 那么你是大学联考落榜罗，不过不只是你一个人。

sentences.english: He was in black despair when he failed in the joint examination.
sentences.chinese: 当他联考不及格时，他绝望了。

sentences.english: Comparison of Property Law and relevant laws and its application;
sentences.chinese: 考法律联考，对于法律专业的人员，比较好。

sentences.english: What have you been doing since your entrance exams ?
sentences.chinese: 什么了，你做你的，因为联考？

sentences.english: Should they only want to get the best grades and pass the JCEE?
sentences.chinese: 难道仅仅为了进入最好的年级，然后通过大学联考吗？

sentences.english: What if she fails the joint university entrance examination?
sentences.chinese: 如果她通不过大学入门联考怎么办？
谁该从非联考途径申请？

definition: college entrance exam (especially as abbr. for 普通高等學校招生全國統一考試|普通高等学校招生全国统一考试[Pu3 tong1 Gao1 deng3 Xue2 xiao4 Zhao1 sheng1 Quan2 guo2 Tong3 yi1 Kao3 shi4])/(Tw) entrance exam for senior government service posts (abbr. for 公務人員高等考試|公务人员高等考试)
exam candidate/student whose name has been put forward for an exam
to beat/to hit/variant of 考[kao3]/to inspect/to test/to take an exam
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
entrance exam for senior middle school
horizontal line (in a fraction)/minimum passing score
to enter oneself for an examination
